text: Mr. Sunshine is an ABC sitcom series that aired from 9 February to 6 April 2011 as a mid-season replacement. It aired for one season and 13 episodes. It starred Matthew Perry, Allison Janney, Andrea Anders, James Lesure and Nate Torrence. ==Other websites== * Category:2011 American television series debuts Category:2011 American television series endings Category:ABC network series
title: Mr. Sunshine (2011 TV series)
